fullText.originalText: Dancing shoes sync with Milky Way playlist, auntie's silk scarf controls weather. The speaker grows medicinal herbs, mayor wants to patent our shuffle dance moves
fullText.baseText: 舞鞋同步银河系歌单，阿姨的丝巾控制天气，音响种草药，市长想给我们的鬼步舞申请专利
fullText.finalText: 星际蹦迪鞋，歌单跨旋臂同步。阿姨的丝巾呼风唤雨，低音炮里种人参，市长要申遗我们的魔性舞步

fullText.originalText: Moon cake mold prints Tiktok trends, our spaceship group buys black hole coupons. Alien customers give five-star reviews, Jupiter's storms are free shipping zones
fullText.baseText: 月饼模具打印抖音热搜，我们飞船团购黑洞优惠券，外星顾客给五星好评，木星风暴是包邮区
fullText.finalText: 登月模具，热榜直接刻在月饼上。星舰拼团黑洞第二件半价，三体人五星好评，木星之眼包邮到家
